elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {D} : []The next Permanent you play this Afternoon costs {1} less.

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: {H} You may put a card from your hand in Reserve. If you do: You may have target Character gain [[Fleeting]].
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {D} : []The next Character you play this turn gains 1 boost.

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: {R} You may put a card from your hand in Reserve. If it's a Permanent: You may activate the {j} abilities of target Permanent you control.
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {D} : []You may put a card from your hand in Reserve.

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: When you create a token — You may put a card from your hand in Reserve. If you do: Target Character gains 1 boost.
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {D} : []The next Character you play this turn gains 1 boost.

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: {R} You may put a card from your hand in Reserve. If it's a Permanent: I gain 1 boost.
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {D} : []The next card you play this Afternoon costs {1} less.

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: When another Robot joins your Expeditions — You may put a card from your hand in Reserve. If it's a Permanent: You may have target Character other than me lose [[Fleeting]] and gain 1 boost.
{R} You may put a card from your hand in Reserve. If it's a Permanent: I gain 1 boost per card in your Reserve.  When you create a token — []I gain 2 boosts.
{J} You may put a card from your hand in Reserve. If you do: You may have target Character other than me lose [[Fleeting]] and gain 1 boost.  When you play a Permanent — [][Resupply].
{R} You may put a card from your hand in Reserve. If you do: The next Permanent you play this Afternoon costs {1} less.
When another Robot joins your Expeditions — You may put a card from your hand in Reserve. If you do: I gain 1 boost per Landmark you control.
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {D} : []You may put a card from your hand in Reserve.

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: {H} You may put a card from your hand in Reserve. If it's a Permanent: [Resupply].
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {D} : []The next Permanent you play this Afternoon costs {1} less.

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: {H} You may put a card from your hand in Reserve. If you do: Create a [Brassbug 2/2/2] Robot token in target Expedition.
